issue.title: Mass properties for the Atlas Unplugged v4 SDF are way off

content.raw:
Here is a summary of the changes:

New mass values:
pelvis	9.509
ltorso	2.270
mtorso	0.799
utorso	84.409
head	2.901
l_uglut	1.959
l_lglut	0.898
l_uleg	8.204
l_lleg	4.515
l_talus	0.125
l_foot	2.410
r_uglut	1.959
r_lglut	0.898
r_uleg	8.204
r_lleg	4.515
r_talus	0.125
r_foot	2.410
l_clav	4.466
l_scap	3.899
l_uarm	4.386
l_larm	3.248
l_ufarm	4.386
l_lfarm	2.509
r_clav	4.466
r_scap	3.899
r_uarm	4.386
r_larm	3.248
r_ufarm	4.386
r_lfarm	2.509

Only utorso had changes to COM and MOI
moi_xx	moi_xy	moi_xz	moi_yy	moi_yz	moi_zz	com_x	com_y	com_z
1.577	-0.032	0.102	1.602	0.047	0.565	-0.0622	0.0023	0.3157

Here is a summary of the changes:

New mass values: pelvis 9.509 ltorso 2.270 mtorso 0.799 utorso 84.409 head 2.901 l_uglut 1.959 l_lglut 0.898 l_uleg 8.204 l_lleg 4.515 l_talus 0.125 l_foot 2.410 r_uglut 1.959 r_lglut 0.898 r_uleg 8.204 r_lleg 4.515 r_talus 0.125 r_foot 2.410 l_clav 4.466 l_scap 3.899 l_uarm 4.386 l_larm 3.248 l_ufarm 4.386 l_lfarm 2.509 r_clav 4.466 r_scap 3.899 r_uarm 4.386 r_larm 3.248 r_ufarm 4.386 r_lfarm 2.509

Only utorso had changes to COM and MOI moi_xx moi_xy moi_xz moi_yy moi_yz moi_zz com_x com_y com_z 1.577 -0.032 0.102 1.602 0.047 0.565 -0.0622 0.0023 0.3157
